/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements and signs, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, going about their day. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
